content: Me? Hmm~ Ears up, I'm off on patrol! Gonna see if there's anything fun! Uh, I mean, dangerous around!
info: 莫白聚餐-莎莎闲聊_主流程文本II

content: {A点头}Once you're done here, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, don't forget to check in with <style=NpcName>Mobai</style> at the Camp. Looks like he's tinkering with something new.
